title: Additional academic expertise on cross national EU learning on environmental governance and water catchment management. KT Activities with sustainab
abstractText: This grant was supplementary to RES-229-25-0009-A Developing a Catchment Management Template for Protection of Water Resources. Please see full details for that award for abstract, outcomes and all other information.
findingsText: This grant was supplementary to RES-229-25-0009A. Please see that award for all details. Please see RES-229-25-0009A Agriculture, Food and Drink,Environment
